remarks: Each entry (according to Wikipedia "Matrix (mathematics)", 30-Dec-2018, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matrix_(mathematics)#Definition (or element or component or coefficient or cell) of a matrix is an element of the underlying ring, deduction form.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2019.)
statement:
matecl.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
matecl.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
matecld.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
matecld.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. N ) $.
matecld.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. N ) $.
matecld.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. B ) $.
matecld $p |- ( ph -> ( I M J ) e. K ) $.
